content.query:
--CREATE SCHEMA Sales

CREATE TABLE Sales.dimOrderDate (
    [Order_Number] INT NOT NULL,
    [Order_Date] DATE NULL,
    [Status] VARCHAR(20) NULL
)
WITH(CLUSTERED INDEX ([Order_Number]))

--------------------------------------------
CREATE TABLE Sales.dimProducts (
    [Product_Code] VARCHAR NOT NULL,
    [MSRP] INT NOT NULL,
    [Product_Line] VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
)
WITH(CLUSTERED INDEX ([Product_Code]))

-----------------------------------------------
CREATE TABLE Sales.dimSalesDeals(
    [Sales] INT NOT NULL,
    [Deal_Size] VARCHAR(30) NULL
)
WITH(CLUSTERED INDEX ([Sales]))

----------------------------------------------
CREATE TABLE Sales.dimCustomers(
    [Customer_Name] VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    [Phone] VARCHAR(50) NULL,
	[Address_Line1] VARCHAR(100) NULL,
	[Address_Line2] VARCHAR(100) NULL,
	[City] VARCHAR(50) NULL,
	[State] VARCHAR(50) NULL,
	[Postal_Code] VARCHAR(50) NULL,
	[Country] VARCHAR(50) NULL,
	[Territory] VARCHAR(50) NULL,
	[Contact_Lastname] VARCHAR(20) NULL,
	[Conact_Firstname] VARCHAR(20) NULL
)
WITH(CLUSTERED INDEX ([Customer_Name]))

---------------------------------------------

CREATE TABLE Sales.factOrders(
    [Order_Number] INT NOT NULL,
    [Product_Code] INT NOT NULL,
	[Customer_Name] VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
	[Quantity_Ordered] INT NOT NULL,
	[Price_Each] INT NOT NULL,
	[Sales] INT NOT NULL

)
WITH(CLUSTERED INDEX ([Order_Number],[Product_Code]))
